title: Sunshine Coast Designer Beach Houses 15 Minutes from Noosa with Two Resort-Style Pools
description:
Experience bespoke beachside luxury in the heart of the Sunshine Coast, just 15 minutes from Noosa, in a boutique designer beach house. This is the holiday escape you've been dreaming of - refined coastal design meets high-end resort living, where guests have access to two heated pools, one with an exclusive bar, all while staying in supreme luxury.

Take a family holiday or plan your next group getaway with a collection of architecturally designed and chic three, four and five bedroom beach houses offering well-appointed kitchens, outdoor entertainment areas and even a private pool in select homes. Every detail is finely curated, from signature bathroom products to private landscaped gardens.

With a backdrop of Noosa’s verdant UNESCO-listed Biosphere Reserve, a short walk from the white sands of Peregian Beach and a 15-minute drive from Noosa's Hastings Street, this is laidback coastal living at its best.
location_description: Essence Peregian Beach - Boutique Hotel & Holiday Homes
offer_address: 1 Sunset Lane, Peregian Beach, Queensland 4573, Australia

title: Ultra-Chic Sunshine Coast Resort 15 Minutes from Noosa with Boutique Studios & Suites + A$100 Credit
description:
Experience a new era of bespoke beachside luxury in the heart of the Sunshine Coast, just 15 minutes from Noosa, in this collection of boutique studios and suites. This is the holiday escape you’ve been dreaming of - coastal design meets high-end resort living, where guests have access to two heated pools, one with an exclusive bar, all while staying in supreme luxury.

Escape to a trendy studio with someone special where no stylistic stone has been left unturned, or take the family to an ultra-spacious two-bedroom suite complete with a balcony for enjoying the tropical breeze. With a backdrop of Noosa’s UNESCO-listed Biosphere Reserve, a short walk from the white sands of Peregian Beach and a 15-minute drive from Noosa’s Hastings Street, this is laidback coastal living at its best.

Every detail is finely curated, from signature bathroom products to specially designed bathrobes and minibars fully stocked with everything you need to create your perfect cocktail. From the bespoke bar to the to-die-for decor, find comfort, ease and enjoyment hidden around every corner at this brand-new, exclusive resort.
location_description: Essence Peregian Beach - Boutique Hotel & Holiday Homes
offer_address: 1 Sunset Lane, Peregian Beach, Queensland 4573, Australia

title: Sunshine Coast Beachside Two- & Three-Bedroom Townhouses with Ocean Views & Direct Beach Access
description:
Boasting easy access to the glistening Peregian Beach and a 10-minute drive to glamorous Noosa, these stylish townhouses are perfectly poised for coastal relaxation.

Your two- or three-bedroom home is fitted with spacious, sun-soaked living areas, glorious ocean views, modern appliances and easy access to the wider resort facilities. Swim in the outdoor heated lap pool, cook up a storm in the communal BBQ area, relax in the sauna and go head-to-head in the games room.

When you're not relaxing on the beach, walk into the bustling Peregian Village and wander the charming boutiques, stop for lunch at a cafe and join in on a yoga class, or take a short drive to Noosa for luxury shopping and more sparkling beaches.
offer_address: 388 David Low Way, Peregian Beach, Queensland 4573, Australia
